trans:
ğŸ“Œ Voting Method
1. Individual Voting - Vote for 7 trainees you support!
2. Assembly Voting - Assemble 14 trainees to complete 'Your Idol'!
ğŸ“Œ Voting Information
- When voting for the first time, please complete SMS authentication and join the PROJECT 7 community.
- Voting will only be recognized if both [Individual Voting] and Assembly Voting are completed.
- The results of the [Individual Voting] will be reflected in the individual rankings of the trainees.
- The results of the [Assembly Voting] will be reflected in the next competition team's assembly.
ğŸ“Œ Voting Event
- When the voting mission is completed, a Weverse Collection badge will be awarded. Among those who complete the mission, 25 people will be randomly selected to receive a pass to attend the show.
ğŸ“Œ Voting Event Precautions
1. When participating in the vote, your voting history (nickname, W ID) will be provided to SLL Central for the purpose of selecting winners.
2. Only for event winners, additional personal information (email address) will be provided to SLL Central.
- Purpose of Provision: SLL Central will contact winners to request the personal information necessary for prize delivery (name/date of birth/nationality/contact information).
3. Winners will receive a separate notification via email on November 2nd. If there is no reply to the email by noon (KST) on Monday, November 4th, the prize may not be received.
4. The collected personal information will not be used for purposes other than prize delivery.
- Retention and Use Period of Collected Personal Information:  For applicants, within 7 days after the announcement of winners, and for winners, within 1 year.
